After a moment, after hearing this New Megatron's announcement, Lord 
Vykos decided to act.

Vykos: Warghoul, find out what you can on this Megatron Revived. I 
will meet this "Hydras".

Warghoul left clumsily for a computer room while his Lord opened a 
door and greeted his guests.

Vykos: Welcome to my ship, Hydras. I am Lord Vykos, but surely, a 
part of you remembers me, doesn't it? I am afraid that your guards 
aren't allowed to hear what I have to say. They will have to stay 
here for now.
